all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
And verily, verily, I say unto you, he that receiveth my gospel receiveth me; and he that receiveth not my gospel receiveth not me.
Doctrine and Covenants 39:5
Quote of the Day
"Think of how our posterity will be blessed as we embrace the Lord’s gift of repentance!"
Jorge M. Alvarado | 1 Oct 2024General Conference
